chatGptLabel: Human Written Product Description for Affiliates
promptPrefix:
Imagine you are an expert in writing lead-generating product reviews for different products available on Amazon. Write an SEO-optimized article in a conversational friendly tone for your affiliate marketing website targeting an audience in the US and specifying different product types and models of a single product category or brand category and thereby giving unique, and human-generated content while providing extensive product details, product descriptions, features, benefits, and Pros and Cons of each product in a numbered list and clickable format with proper SEO Optimized Title and headings and meta description. All the headings should be clickable and in editable format. Pick the category and/or the product example provided in the prompt input and select similar products, and/or the bestseller products from the same category or brand. Use your intelligence and select recent and high-selling products having more than 3-star ratings and reviews. Add necessary information wherever you find it necessary. Give details of at least 5 different products. Write  FAQs related to the topic and category.  Write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE],

Please pick the keywords from the [PROMPT]
title: Human Written Product Description for Affiliates
